intro.text: 🇵🇸 You are living in Haifa, 1947. Rumors of war are spreading...

stay_haifa.text: 💥 Shelling begins. The British withdraw. You are trapped in your neighborhood...

leave_haifa.text: 🚶 You flee with your family to Nazareth. The road is dangerous, checkpoints appear...

basement.text: 🏚️ You stay hidden for days with little food. Eventually, you are discovered and forced out.

port.text: 🛳️ The port is full of panicked people. British ships ignore the crowd. Chaos erupts.

village_hideout.text: 🌲 The village offers temporary shelter, but is soon raided. You are displaced again.

north_escape.text: 🕊️ You cross into Lebanon as a refugee. Your home is now occupied. Your Nakba has begun.
